description: Perform agglomerative hierarchical clustering for user specified parameter sub-bricks, for all voxels whose threshold statistic is above a user specified value.

prefix.title: Output dataset prefix
prefix.description: Use 'pname' for the output dataset prefix name.

session_dir.title: Session directory
session_dir.description: Use 'dir' for the output dataset session directory.

verbose.title: Verbose output
verbose.description: Print out verbose output as the program proceeds.

thresh.title: Threshold
thresh.description: Threshold statistic from file tname. Only voxels whose threshold statistic is greater than t in absolute value will be considered. If file tname contains more than 1 sub-brick, the threshold stat. sub-brick must be specified.

nclust.title: Number of clusters
nclust.description: Maximum number of clusters for output (= number of sub-bricks in output dataset).
